sentences: Brian Fallon (born January 28, 1980) is an American musician, singer and songwriter.
Brian Fallon (born January 28, 1980) is an American musician, singer and songwriter.
Since 2016, Fallon has released four solo albums and one EP.
Fallon was born in Red Bank, New Jersey, in 1980.

sentences: Molly and the Zombies is an Americana/folk group that was formed in 2013 by Fallon with guitarist and Plow United frontman Brian McGee, former Ryan Adams and the Cardinals bassist Catherine Popper, and Scissor Sisters drummer Randy Schrager.

sentences: Brian Fallon is a Christian, but he avoids using references to his faith in his music.
section: == Personal life ==
